channel.title: Project ~ Droid ~
channel.description:
[center]
[img]http://i31.servimg.com/u/f31/15/41/66/49/untitl10.png[/img]
Hello Everyone. I Am Looking For A Development Team For A 562 Server.
__________________________________________________________________________ [size=24pt]Goals:[/size]
Some Goals I Am Aiming To Achive Are:
Web Client. Fix Bugs. Re-Wright Economy. New Home. New Starter package. All Bosses. More Items. And Much More.
__________________________________________________________________________
[size=18pt]I Currently Need:[/size]
[Server Coder]
(ME) (OPEN)
[Web Master]
(ME) (Orange)
[Client Coder]
(OPEN) (OPEN)
[Beta Testers]
(OPEN) (OPEN)
[GFX]
(OPEN) (OPEN)
_________________________________________________
[size=18pt]How To Apply:[/size]
Name: Age: Way Of Conatact, MSN or Yahoo: Email Used For Yahoo Or MSN: What Your Applying For: Why Do You Think You Deserve This Spot: What Can You Do In That Field: If Applying For GFX, Please Post Some Of Your Work In The Application:
______________________________________________________________________
I Have Many Ideas For This Server And I Think I Will Have The Potential To Make It Big.
Hope To See You Soon :P
_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
~Messer~[/center]

item.description:
@mandood77 wrote:

Name:Uzzi
Age:13
Way Of Conatact, MSN or Yahoo: sonicx5x@hotmail.com
Email Used For Yahoo Or MSN:
What Your Applying For: beta tester
Why Do You Think You Deserve This Spot: im a good listener and always follow instructions, and i think this may be a good way for me to learn sommore =)
What Can You Do In That Field: anything u ask me to do, test specs, test emotes, test killing (you) jks

SideNote: You should declare me as a secondary beta tester, you’ll find out why if im in.
